articles.description: ELTON JOHN turned 75-years-old this week. The star achieved a lot in his music career, but nothing is as shocking as sending John Lennon over the edge just before he stepped out onto the stage. Despite this, Elton and his crew were left in tears by John's app…

articles.title: 007 James Bond Reality Show Competition Set for Amazon's Prime Video - IGN - IGN
articles.description: Amazon's Prime Video has greenlit its first James Bond TV show in 007's Road to a Million - a "Bond-style spin on a race around the world" reality show competition.
articles.content:

articles.author: Nick Enoch
articles.title: Ukrainian president Volodymyr Zelensky in talks to speak at the Academy Awards - Daily Mail
articles.description: Zelensky, 44, could briefly appear either via a live broadcast or taped message. But sources are concerned about the ceremony becoming politicised, given the current war in Ukraine.
articles.content:
Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has been in talks with the Academy Awards to speak during Sunday's ceremony.
Zelensky, himself a former actor, could briefly appear at the Oscars - either via … [+2601 chars]

articles.title: Gogglebox viewers send their support to Ellie Warner as she is absent from the show - Daily Mail
articles.description: The TV star, 31, has reportedly been told by Channel 4 producers that there is 'no pressure to return to filming' and she can 'take all the time she needs'.
articles.content:
Ellie Warner and her sister Izzi were absent from the latest episode of Gogglebox on Friday night after her boyfriend Nat Eddleston's horror car crash.

articles.title: ‘I would not be free to express my opinion’: Philip Pullman steps down as Society of Authors president - The Guardian
articles.description: Move comes in the wake of writer’s controversial comments about Kate Clanchy’s book Some Kids I Taught and What They Taught Me
articles.content: Philip Pullman has stepped down as president of the Society of Authors (SoA) after comments he made about Kate Clanchys controversial memoir, Some Kids I Taught and What They Taught Me. In a letter s… [+3079 chars]
